argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | psrring.s | |- S = ( I mPwSer R ) |
| 2 |  | psrring.i | |- ( ph -> I e. V ) |
| 3 |  | psrring.r | |- ( ph -> R e. Ring ) |
| 4 |  | psr1cl.d | |- D = { f e. ( NN0 ^m I ) | ( `' f " NN ) e. Fin } |
| 5 |  | psr1cl.z | |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) |
| 6 |  | psr1cl.o | |- .1. = ( 1r ` R ) |
| 7 |  | psr1cl.u | |- U = ( x e. D |-> if ( x = ( I X. { 0 } ) , .1. , .0. ) ) |
| 8 |  | psr1cl.b | |- B = ( Base ` S ) |
| 9 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` R ) = ( Base ` R ) |
| 10 | 9, 6 | #P_ringidcl | |- ( R e. Ring -> .1. e. ( Base ` R ) ) |
| 11 | 9, 5 | #P_ring0cl | |- ( R e. Ring -> .0. e. ( Base ` R ) ) |
| 12 | 10, 11 | #P_ifcld | |- ( R e. Ring -> if ( x = ( I X. { 0 } ) , .1. , .0. ) e. ( Base ` R ) ) |
| 13 | 3, 12 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> if ( x = ( I X. { 0 } ) , .1. , .0. ) e. ( Base ` R ) ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. D ) -> if ( x = ( I X. { 0 } ) , .1. , .0. ) e. ( Base ` R ) ) |
| 15 | 14, 7 | #P_fmptd | |- ( ph -> U : D --> ( Base ` R ) ) |
| 16 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( Base ` R ) e. _V |
| 17 |  | #P_ovex | |- ( NN0 ^m I ) e. _V |
| 18 | 4, 17 | #P_rabex2 | |- D e. _V |
| 19 | 16, 18 | #P_elmap | |- ( U e. ( ( Base ` R ) ^m D ) <-> U : D --> ( Base ` R ) ) |
| 20 | 15, 19 | #P_sylibr | |- ( ph -> U e. ( ( Base ` R ) ^m D ) ) |
| 21 | 1, 9, 4, 8, 2 | #P_psrbas | |- ( ph -> B = ( ( Base ` R ) ^m D ) ) |
| 22 | 20, 21 | #P_eleqtrrd | |- ( ph -> U e. B ) |
